programme.title: Motorsport F1 Grand Prix
programme.desc: The final race of the 2010 Formula One season takes place at the Yas Marina circuit in Abu Dhabi. The battle for the drivers' title has been one of the most competitive for years, with world champions Jenson Button, Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso pushing hard against the Red Bulls of Sebastian Vettel and Mark Webber. The identity of this year's champion is likely to rest on today's result. Red Bull were the dominant force in last year's inaugural race on this circuit, clinching a one-two finish. Can Alonso or the two Britons prevent a repeat result?(n)
